Name: UnScared
About the game: UnScared you play as someone who break in to an old Asylum that have been shut down to illegal experiments. After a terrible incident one of the patients have transformed into an creepy creature that still living in there. Will be no helps or clues so you have to find your way out by your own. Remember... your are ALONE! Features: - Flashlight (with some batteries hidden) - Lighter (so you can see if you run out of betteries) - Newspapers and documents spread out - Some jumpscares
